H0.text: india 's first arctic research station set up in 2008 what is the name. Dakshin Gangotri Station

H1.text: india 's first arctic research station set up in 2008 what is the name. IndArc Station

H2.text: india 's first arctic research station set up in 2008 what is the name. Aryabhata Station

H3.text: india 's first arctic research station set up in 2008 what is the name. Himadri Station

A4.text: In 2008, India set up its first permanent research base on the Arctic Ocean, Himadri.

A5.text: In 2014, the second Arctic research station, a moored observatory named IndARC was commissioned.
